body_html:
It would be great if CuDNN would support this as an option. Do you know if there is anywhere we can make a feature request?

I have an implementation in terms of autograd functions, but it's indeed much slower than the GridSampler. The custom CUDA kernel is a last resort option, from my point of view.

body:
It would be great if CuDNN would support this as an option. Do you know if there is anywhere we can make a feature request? 

I have an implementation in terms of autograd functions, but it's indeed much slower than the GridSampler. The custom CUDA kernel is a last resort option, from my point of view.
